00001 import wx
00002 import wx.grid
00003 import wx.html
00004 import wx.aui

00006 # -- wx.SizeReportCtrl --
00007 # (a utility control that always reports its client size)
00008 
00009 class SizeReportCtrl(wx.PyControl):
00010 
00011     def __init__(self, parent, id=wx.ID_ANY, pos=wx.DefaultPosition,
00012                  size=wx.DefaultSize, mgr=None):
00013 
00014         wx.PyControl.__init__(self, parent, id, pos, size, wx.NO_BORDER)
00015             
00016         self._mgr_mgr = mgr
00017 
00018         self.Bind(wx.EVT_PAINT, self.OnPaintOnPaint)
00019         self.Bind(wx.EVT_SIZE, self.OnSizeOnSize)
00020         self.Bind(wx.EVT_ERASE_BACKGROUND, self.OnEraseBackgroundOnEraseBackground)
00021 
00022 
00023     def OnPaint(self, event):
00024 
00025         dc = wx.PaintDC(self)
00026         
00027         size = self.GetClientSize()
00028         s = ("Size: %d x %d")%(size.x, size.y)
00029 
00030         dc.SetFont(wx.NORMAL_FONT)
00031         w, height = dc.GetTextExtent(s)
00032         height = height + 3
00033         dc.SetBrush(wx.WHITE_BRUSH)
00034         dc.SetPen(wx.WHITE_PEN)
00035         dc.DrawRectangle(0, 0, size.x, size.y)
00036         dc.SetPen(wx.LIGHT_GREY_PEN)
00037         dc.DrawLine(0, 0, size.x, size.y)
00038         dc.DrawLine(0, size.y, size.x, 0)
00039         dc.DrawText(s, (size.x-w)/2, ((size.y-(height*5))/2))
00040         
00041         if self._mgr_mgr:
00042         
00043             pi = self._mgr_mgr.GetPane(self)
00044             
00045             s = ("Layer: %d")%pi.dock_layer
00046             w, h = dc.GetTextExtent(s)
00047             dc.DrawText(s, (size.x-w)/2, ((size.y-(height*5))/2)+(height*1))
00048            
00049             s = ("Dock: %d Row: %d")%(pi.dock_direction, pi.dock_row)
00050             w, h = dc.GetTextExtent(s)
00051             dc.DrawText(s, (size.x-w)/2, ((size.y-(height*5))/2)+(height*2))
00052             
00053             s = ("Position: %d")%pi.dock_pos
00054             w, h = dc.GetTextExtent(s)
00055             dc.DrawText(s, (size.x-w)/2, ((size.y-(height*5))/2)+(height*3))
00056             
00057             s = ("Proportion: %d")%pi.dock_proportion
00058             w, h = dc.GetTextExtent(s)
00059             dc.DrawText(s, (size.x-w)/2, ((size.y-(height*5))/2)+(height*4))
00060         
00061 
00062     def OnEraseBackground(self, event):
00063         # intentionally empty
00064         pass        
00065     
00066 
00067     def OnSize(self, event):
00068     
00069         self.Refresh()
00070         event.Skip()
